comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Think this is her: Elizabeth Louise Kirlin (b. 1894), daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Joseph Parker Kirlin, married Cletus Keating in 1920. Joseph Parker Kirlin (1861-1927) was a Scranton-born attorney, specializing in maritime law. Mrs. Kirlin was the former Elizabeth Burt of Detroit. Cletus Keating (1891-) was also a lawyer. They raised at least four children together: Cletus Jr., Anne, Parker, and Marshall. (Cletus Jr., b 1916, seems to have been the child of his father's first, brief marriage to Maud Scott, who died in 1917.)
